author: Special Correspondent
text:
Here is an event that you can take your trash to and walk out with something useful made from it.

The Upcycling Studio Auroville in Udavi School– Edayanchavadi is holding an upcycling exhibition that opens on Saturday between 4 p.m. and 7 p.m.

The event will feature some thought-prodding work by Ok Jonglee, Marc Barandard and Orly Merguei that includes sculpture, chairs, stools, bags and hats — all made from trash. The show on upcycling, which essentially represents the art of giving a new value to trash, will be on till February 27 and open from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.
title: Where trash is given a new value
